metadata.title: CVE-2023-2745 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: WordPress Core is vulnerable to Directory Traversal in versions up to, andincluding, 6.2, via the ‘wp_lang’ parameter. This allows unauthenticatedattackers to access and load arbitrary translation files. In cases where anattacker is able to upload a crafted translation file onto the site, suchas via an upload form, this could be also used to perform a Cross-SiteScripting attack.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
